thread.title: ‘Game of Thrones’ might have more episodes left than we thought

author: Chris Smith
title: ‘Game of Thrones’ might have more episodes left than we thought
text:
HBO hasn't yet formally renew Game of Thrones for an eighth season, and there’s an exciting — or annoying — reason for that. It all depends on your personal take on the hit TV series. 
Continue reading...
